short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches tabs in the order you used them (use Ctrl+Q or Ctrl+Shift+Q to swith backward or forward in tab history)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you find Chrome's default tab switching behavior unsatisfying, and you would like to switch tabs based on your usage, remembering what tabs you used recently, you should give this extension a try.

Using the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Q, or Ctrl+Shift+Q you'll be able to have the improved tab switching you expect. (we use Q key as TAB key is disallowed by chrome for accessibility reasons). 

Please me know your thoughts and if you find bugs I would appreciate if you report them so we make this extension better for everyone.
